banner.banner_text: Spaco is a cross-platform service that gives you an opportunity to quickly access your files and share them securely with other users.

article.h1: All the necessary files at hand

cards.text_card: Documents, videos, presentations, archives, projects. We have no restrictions on the size or extension of the uploaded files.
Your phone and computer storage will remain free as all your files will be stored on our servers.
We use 256-bit encryption and a built-in antivirus to keep you safe from hacks and malware.
No need to wait for the submission or give someone access to your folders. Just create a download link in a couple of clicks.
We conduct regular backups. Any deleted or changed file can be restored within 30 days.
If you encounter any difficulties, send a request to our technical support, and an operator will contact you within 15 minutes.

footer.footer_text: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia

of_banner.banner_text: Work with files offline and they will be uploaded to the storage automatically as soon as Internet access appears.

of_cards.of_title_card: The file will go into the storage automatically

Average response time of an operator is 10 minutes. You will get the information you need really quickly and without wasting time or nerves.

rates_cards.text_card: You can use it to store any kind of files without limitations on their size, storage duration or the amount of downloads.
The antivirus checks all the uploading files for viruses to keep you and the person you’re sharing the file link with safe.
We back up your files to stay on the safe side and make sure you don’t lose access to them.
If you delete a necessary file by mistake and 30 days after deletion haven’t passed, we will restore it.
They will stay in touch whenever you need them, give advise, teach you how to work with the service and help quickly resolve any issue that may arise.

slider1.slider1_text: Spaco means space in Esperanto. Indeed, the service is simply cosmic! I've been using it for several months now and I'm completely satisfied. Thank you!

Our whole department switched to Spaco. It's very convenient to exchange files, especially when there are several dozen people in the team, and you also attract freelancers. And most importantly, you don't have to spend a lot of time downloading and uploading!
I have an Acer Nitro 5 laptop, a Xiaomi Redmi 9C smartphone, plus a hand-assembled computer in the office – it works stably everywhere, synchronization is fast, no problems.
The speed is really cosmic! Even on my old laptop! I've finally found the perfect file sharing service for myself!
This is my first time using cloud storage, except for Google Drive. How convenient it really is!

I've been using it for three months, the problem arose once, and that was my fault – I kept about a dozen copies of the file at different stages of editing and deleted the necessary one. I contacted technical support, they answered in 10 minutes, restored the file in 2 hours! Thank you very much!
The service is cosmic! I'm using the free plan for now, but when it ends, I really won't mind the money to pay! Very comfortable!
Finally, REALLY fast uploads to cloud storage! Thank you!

Works great on all my gadgets! Moreover, both on the latest and on old models. Colleagues installed it, too, and had no complaints. All in all, a great app for business tasks! Looking forward to seeing it on iPhone devices!

We’ve tested several services (won’t give away the names not to encourage adverse publicity). As a result, we chose Spaco, it’s the most convenient and quick. We’ve been using it for two months and it’s all good!

slider1.slider1_title: Anna Sokolova, marketing manager at LLC “Ariadna-Service”
slider1.slider1_text: I gave my colleague access to my account and, of course, he deleted a necessary file… we noticed it in like a month, right before project handover! The stress was ferocious – we were afraid it’s deleted for good. But! They found and restored it within several hours! I’m speechless, thanks to Spaco technical support and personally to Alexei!

I love Spaco! In addition to the service itself, technical support is always a good chat, it’s a very positive team. Probably, it’s  like at one of the Ford factories – they get paid not for the working time, but for the time of rest, so they are interested in quickly processing applications and helping customers!

about_banner.about_banner_text: Our mission is to grant you easy access to all the necessary files as well as to give you an opportunity to share them with other users quickly, easily and safely. Spaco helps create a working environment and optimize routine business processes.

history.history_text: Spaco company was founded out of our personal need for a nice cloud service where you could upload files of any size, store them for as long as you need and recover data in case something is deleted by mistake.
history.history_text2: Having created such a product for ourselves, we systemized and synchronized our work to the extent that we could no longer keep it away from the whole world. One can get to strategic tasks once they are done with the tactic ones. Then they can bring their business to a brand new level.

team.team_text: Today the Spaco team consists of 18 people. Together, we monitor the changing market needs and keep our finger on the pulse of technology. This allows us to constantly improve our service and open up new business opportunities.
team.team_text2: Our in-house service has made remote work possible for all of our employees. Thanks to this, we not only preserved quality, but also were able to accept talented programmers from other countries into the team.
team.team_text3: Instead of sitting around from bell to bell, we choose intensive work in comfortable conditions. If this approach is close to you, you can become part of our team.
